name: Genshin Banner Simulator - Bullet Hell Edition
name_original: Genshin Banner Simulator - Bullet Hell Edition
description:
Is getting a C6 Ayaka a good idea? Or will you just get Debate Clubbed?

Avoid 3* weapons and welcome dear Ayaka home! And the occasional Qiqi too.

Trigger Warning: Banner RNG

Arrow keys/ WASD/ touch joypad to move.

Chibi Aether art from here. 

All other art and sound are owned by Hoyoverse.
